Texts.Chs: 或许你最后将会发现这些材料其他的获取途径，不过现在学习到的这种方式我想对于你来说应该是最佳的选择。记得，请多多尝试各种实验。
Texts.Eng: You'll eventually find other sources for these useful materials, but for now this is the best method you have access to. Experimentation will get you far!

Texts.Chs: 你收集到了^orange;水^reset;！如果你打算获取^green;氢气、氧气和钠^reset;，就请收集^orange;水^reset;，然后把它放入^orange;萃取设备^reset;中，接下来，请萃取出^green;5份氢气^reset;吧！
Texts.Eng: You've gathered ^orange;water^reset;! If you want to gather ^green;Hydrogen,Oxygen and Sodium^reset;, collect some ^orange;water or water buckets^reset; and then use any ^orange;extractor^reset; to create ^green;5 hydrogen^reset;!
